title: The Jungle
overview: When the veil of the night falls over the city, wild animals are out hunting. In this concrete jungle, infamous among nightlife enthusiasts is Rendezvous, a nightclub hidden in a basement somewhere right in the heart of Thonglor. It conceals itself behind an obscure entrance and comes with a password that changes nightly. On most enchanting nights, this is the meeting place of six mysterious men everyone calls The Jungle.Manning the bar is the secretive yet handsome Hunter, the one and only bartender here in this place whom even the men of The Jungle have no choice but to fear. He has one rule every patron ought to remember: Everything that happens here at the club stays at the club. Routinely haunting one corner of this place are the six hotties that consist of Petai, the snobbish superstar jaguar, Naannam, the chaos-loving viper, Naanfah, the headstrong tiger, Nathee, the hot-headed wolf, Hack, the playful tarantula, and Pine, the leader lion. The six men meet the six women in this mysterious concrete jungle. Will they finally learn to know and accept their own hearts?
